          <title>
            <string language="fr">Orbites des planètes et des satellites</string>
            <string language="en">Orbits of planets and satellites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahnen der Planeten und der Satelliten</string>

          </title>

          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre les orbites des planètes autour du soleil et les orbites des satellites autour de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the orbits of planets around the Sun and the orbits of satellites around the Earth.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bahnen der Planeten um 
die Sonne und die Bahnen der Satelliten um die Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as órbitas dos planetas
em torno do sol e as órbitas dos satélites em torno da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le orbite dei pianeti
intorno al sole e le orbite dei satelliti intorno alla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις τροχιές των πλανητών 
γύρω από τον ήλιο και τις τροχιές των δορυφόρων γύρω από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las órbitas de planetas
alrededor del sol y las órbitas de satélites alrededor de la tierra.</string>
